parameter.name: user_logo_format
parameter.documentation: Specify the format of the logo

parameter.name: user_logo_position_units
parameter.documentation: Units used to define the position of the logo: cm or percent

parameter.name: user_logo_y_position
parameter.documentation: Y position of the imported image

parameter.name: user_logo_x_position
parameter.documentation: X position of the imported image

parameter.name: user_logo_bottom
parameter.documentation: Y position of the imported image

parameter.name: user_logo_left
parameter.documentation: X position of the imported image

parameter.name: user_logo_width
parameter.documentation: width of the imported image (-1 means use the dimension of the image)

parameter.name: user_logo_height
parameter.documentation: height of the imported image (-1 means use the dimension of the image)
